channel.title: Tidy Finance Blog
channel.description: The RSS feed of the blog on tidy-finance.org

item.title: What is Tidy Finance?
item.dc:creator: Christoph Scheuch
Stefan Voigt
Patrick Weiss
item.description: Empirical finance can be tedious. Many standard tasks, such as cleaning data or forming factor portfolios, require a lot of effort. The code to produce even seminal results is typically opaque. Why should researchers have to reinvent the wheel over and over again?

item.title: Tidy Finance at the useR! Conference 2022
item.dc:creator: Patrick Weiss
item.description: We had the pleasure to present our book at the all virtual useR! 2022 conference with 1,227 registered participants from 96 countries. You can find the video of my presentation below.
